trans-unit.source: When paint is applied using a spray nozzle, it is referred to as spray painting.

seg-source.mrk: When paint is applied using a spray nozzle, it is referred to as spray painting.

target.mrk: When paint is applied using a spray nozzle, it is referred to as spray painting.

trans-unit.source: The garage is a good place to spray paint.

seg-source.mrk: The garage is a good place to spray paint.

target.mrk: The garage is a good place to spray paint.

trans-unit.source: Move the car out of the garage to avoid getting paint on it.

seg-source.mrk: Move the car out of the garage to avoid getting paint on it.

target.mrk: Move the car out of the garage to avoid getting paint on it.

trans-unit.source: Place newspaper, cardboard, or a drop-cloth on the garage floor.

seg-source.mrk: Place newspaper, cardboard, or a drop-cloth on the garage floor.

target.mrk: Place newspaper, cardboard, or a drop-cloth on the garage floor.

trans-unit.source: Place the object to be painted on the covered area.

seg-source.mrk: Place the object to be painted on the covered area.

target.mrk: Place the object to be painted on the covered area.

trans-unit.source: Follow the directions on the paint can to paint the object.

seg-source.mrk: Follow the directions on the paint can to paint the object.

target.mrk: Follow the directions on the paint can to paint the object.

trans-unit.source: Let the paint dry thoroughly before you move the object.

seg-source.mrk: Let the paint dry thoroughly before you move the object.

target.mrk: Let the paint dry thoroughly before you move the object.
